author: Special Correspondent
text:
A newborn baby girl dumped in the public toilet at Kayathar bus stand was rescued on Saturday.

Police said sanitation workers, on hearing the continuous crying of the baby, sent their colleague Valliyammal to the toilet. She found the baby dumped with the umbilical cord. As she alerted others and the police, the baby was rescued.

After giving first-aid at Kayathar, the baby was sent to the Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital for treatment. Kayathar police are investigating.
title: Abandoned newborn rescued
